childMarkdownRemark.html:
• Paint
  • Paint trays or disposable lids
  • Sheets of paper

Hand and footprints are a great activity for babies and children of all ages and a lovely keepsake.

You can use hand and footprints to make a variety of things such as:-

| Fish | Trees | | Butterflies | Holly wreaths | | Flowers | Reindeers | | Elephants | |

Squeeze paint onto a tray and allow the child to put their hand or foot into the paint, giving them support to do so if needed.

Give them suggestions on the things they could make with their hand or foot and give them support with this if required.
